text: Michigan's 7th congressional district is a United States congressional district in Southern Michigan and parts of Central Michigan. It includes Lansing, Michigan's state capital, and includes all of Clinton, Shiawassee, Ingham, and Livingston counties, as well as portions of Eaton, Genesee, and Oakland counties. The district is currently represented by Republican Tom Barrett. ==References== Category:Congressional districts of Michigan
title: Michigan's 7th congressional district
